title: Himi 311
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Na’e iku’i ‘e Sīsū
Hotau ngaahi fili;
Ko Sētani, mo e hia,
Mo e mate foki.
2.
Ko e Hau mālohi ia,
Pea ‘oku pule,
Ki Hēvani, ‘i ‘olunga,
Pea mo lalo ni.
3.
Pea hufekina ma’u pē,
Ki he’ene Tamai,
Hotau fa’ahinga hia,
Ke tau mo’ui ai.
4.
‘Oku ne fa’a tokoni mai,
Pea taukapo’i;
‘A e kakai, ‘oku tui,
Pea fai ma’u ai pē.
5.
Ke tau tau ‘i hotau fili,
Pea fai mālohi,
‘I he huafa ‘o Sīsū,
Pea tau iku’i.
6.
Pea te tau lava atu,
Ki he maama lelei,
‘I he ‘ofa mai ‘a Sīsū,
Kia kitautolu. *
